Basic skills in information and map design support critical reading of data visualisations and help present research clearly and convincingly.
This workshop combines theoretical inputs with practical exercises, covering:
- fundamentals of information design
- working with geographic information systems (GIS) and cartographic design
- concrete use cases and discussion
